plot: After indulging in horror comic book reading, Daffy has a dream where he is singing in a nightclub for monsters.
title: The Night of the Living Duck
plot_es: After indulging in horror comic book reading, Daffy has a dream where he is singing in a nightclub for monsters.
original_name: The Night of the Living Duck
plot_en: After indulging in horror comic book reading, Daffy has a dream where he is singing in a nightclub for monsters.
